text: A War () is a 2015 Danish French war drama movie directed by Tobias Lindholm and starring Pilou Asbæk, Søren Malling, Dar Salim, Tuva Novotny, Charlotte Munck. It was distributed by Nordisk Film Production and was nominated for an Academy Award in 2016. ==Other websites== * Category:2015 drama movies Category:2010s war movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:French drama movies
title: A War
